name: Repair The Spaceship
description: STORY You are an astronaut who landed on a desert because of an unfortunate accident. You have to find all the missing rocket pieces and repair your spaceship to continue your journey. You're welcome to use the car to expedite your movement and your guns to protect yourself from zombies CONTROLS W A S D - movement E - interact Space - skip information Mouse Left - attack and build 1-pickaxe 2-pistol 3-ak47 4-flamethrower 5-turret 6-wall 7-producing ammo CREDITS programmer @cenullum 3d models , animations Hamit Akbaş Music @paskilian The game is made for GGJ2020 at @bugGamLab in 2 days. Theme of the jam was "Repair". Global Game Jam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/repair-space-ship-7
